General.Name: Shanghai Weihong Electronic Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai Weihong Electronic Technology Co., Ltd. provides motion control system solutions in China and internationally. It offers control cards; integrated CNC controllers; handheld CNC systems; servo drivers; and CNC accessories, including handwheels, automatic measurement tool sensors, and waterjet five-axis cutting heads. The company sells its CNC controllers for machine tool manufacturers. Its products are used in various industries, such as machining centers, laser and waterjet cutting, engraving and milling, mold making, advertising, glass and stone machining, etc. Shanghai Weihong Electronic Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2007 and is based in Shanghai, China.
